name: Shadow's Blaze
description:
WASD/Arrow keys to move.  Mouse to view enemies

A game about a little soul and it's reaper falling into a different realm while travelling to the after life. The Reaper, can't function without his scythe (lost) and thus the soul and the reaper must work together in solidarity to get out.

Note:

This was our very first game jam ever! We had to cut a lot of corners and a lot of things are missing . Still, we're very grateful for the experience, and learnt a lot from it!

A game by: Serena Abraham and Kartik Tiwari
